concept.title: Glossary
concept.shortdesc: A list of terminology, acronyms and abbreviations.

ul.li: binder: a folder that contains a specific collection of documents
DWG: a binary file format used for containing 2D and 3D design data (derived from drawing)
synch: in the Bricsys 24/7 Transfer Tool, a download can be saved as a synch to remain identical in all locations
